system.description:
The Packrat is comprehensively prepared for this expedition. Within their pack you might find the perfect weapon, the needed medicine, or just the matches you need to light your pipe.
Play the Packrat if you want to be a resourceful support character, command minions, and play around with explosives.

Instructions: You can drag-and-drop into your character sheet any Item you choose and it will automatically be assigned to its correct place. Everything else needs to be copy-pasted or input manually (this includes the background & details and your stats).

MAKING YOUR TBD

Stats

You start with this array; add 1 to a stat of your choice.
  • Iron ±0
  • Glass +1
  • Sulphur -1
  • Mercury ±0
  • Blood starts at 0.

Looks

Ambiguous, Concealed, Feminine, Masculine. Burly body, bent body, stocky body, weaselly body
Asian or South Asian, Black, Caucasian, Hispanic/Latino, Indigenous, Middle Eastern

Names

Yasmin, Vyasa, Cathaoir, Aleksander, Cecilia, Angela, Clement, Krister, Orinth, Elizabeta.

Gear

Make a weapon (1 perk, 1 flaw).

Pick one extra armament:

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.i0ow12rvpg1ia1t5]{Homemade Explosives}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.rTRJHfmkbptOhq20]{Enchanted shirt}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.O3bwdHzP8vE5I14L]{Extraordinary wine}

Pick two pieces of utility gear:

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.VkwNuRq7SU87RcRS]{A musical instrument}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.dE7VoodDakmTm9Bc]{Antitoxins and miracle cures}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.AUq8WjrIObqncEs8]{A bag of shiny metal coins, in hundreds of denominations}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.2fU8JamvFJY5t7wQ]{As many rations as you need}

Covenants

Go around the table, introducing your explorer to the group. Pick a covenant you have with the player to your left at rank 1. Examples:

  • You healed them up from a mortal wound.
  • They’re heavily in debt to you.
  • You’ve sworn loyalty to them.

Add extra details and context for the covenant the player to your right has chosen.

Moves

Bonded Moves

Pick two:
